summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Spring Street (north side) from 16th Avenue to 17th Avenue in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 16704 creating Local Improvement District No. 1546 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
